modName: Dark Souls Voice for Player Voicesets - DELETED
summary: Compilation of Dark Souls voices merged in one unique voice for the Dragonborn.
descriptionHtml:
If you want your Dovahkiin to sound like some evil baddass villain, this mod is just for you. I found some very good audio files in the Dark Souls series, and I wanted to make my Dragonborn sound just like that. It has some voices of Artorias, some random Ghost voices and everything is compiled in one sound file.

You must complete "Unbound" mission (1st mission in the game), and after that go to MCM menu, find Player Voicesets mod and activate it ! After the mod is activated, sound will be played after certain situations like:

- Entering Dungeon (Discovering new area)
- Fighting (Entering combat)
- Receiving high amounts of damage
- Killing an enemy
- Dying
- Taunting enemies (button for this can be assigned from MCM menu)
- Leveling up
- Finding rare loot

[u][center]REQUIREMENTS:[/center][/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51387/?]Player Voicesets by ChizFoShiz[/url], and all the requirements for that mod
*NOTE: You have to install "[b]Last Version with Custom Voice" !
[/b]
[i]Read more about this mod and how to use it on the mod page, it is essential if you want my mod to work perfectly.[/i]
[u][center]
INSTALLATION:[/center][/u]
Put the Data folder inside your root Skyrim directory, simple as that. (Player Voicesets must be installed first !)

[u][center]CREDITS:[/center][/u]
ChizFoShiz, for awesome voice work on Skyrim game. Best of luck to him.

Enjoy the mod !
author: aston94srb
